channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot holes that make it dangerous to walk in the dark as the pavement is blocked by bins, 11th February
item.description:
At the junction just down behind the first building
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishops Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The tarmac outside No1 Greenhills Road was badly repaired in late 2023. It is tearing up on the Westbound side. All vehicles have to go through it-bicycles, motorbikes & cars. Dangerous., 11th February
item.description:
See pictures. The repair last time was incompetent.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Greenhills Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinkhole under pavement, 11th February
item.description:
Outside Number 1 Blacksmith Lane Churchdown The pavement is collapsing and given the number of old people round here somebody is going to hurt themselves. I think it's happened in the last few days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Blacksmith Lane, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked by silt and grit, 11th February
item.description:
The map and photos should be sufficient to identify location What3Words ///revealing.century.backtrack

item.title: Pothole on the side of a drain cover, 11th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Kayte Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
